summary: VEHICLE BEGAN EXPERIENCING A VIOLENT LURCHING ACTION AROUND 50,000 MILES, EITHER WHEN COMING TO A STOP, OR DEPRESSING BRAKE AFTER SITTING AT A STOP. DEALER "RESET" TRANSMISSION AND PROBLEM BEGAN AGAIN AFTER A COUPLE MONTHS. HAPPENS ONCE A DAY NOW. FEELS LIKE THE VEHICLE IS BEING REAR ENDED. NOW HAVE 100,000 MILES ON VEHICLE.
